ISSUE.TITLE: Integrations - FirstPromoter always showing as "active"
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Issue Summary Hello, I found a bug in the integrations component that seems to lead to a particular integration called "FirstPromoter" to always be displayed as `active`, even when it is not. ### Steps to Reproduce - Go to the settings page: `yourblog.com/ghost/#/settings` - Scroll down to the Integrations panel - Note that the FirstPromoter is shown as active ### Ghost Version 5.79.4 ### Node.js Version 18.19.1 ### How did you install Ghost? Docker image ghost:5.79.4 ### Database type MySQL 5.7 ### Browser & OS version _No response_ ### Relevant log / error output _No response_ ### Code of Conduct - [X] I agree to be friendly and polite to people in this repository

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Extracted Admin's search behaviour from component to service (#20008) ref https://linear.app/tryghost/issue/MOM-1 - pre-requisite to exposing the search behaviour to the editor for internal linking

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Fixed First Promoter always showing Active ref https://github.com/TryGhost/Ghost/issues/19797 - Fixed FirstPromoter always showing Active - This was due to the position of the variable in the array being in the wrong positon and indexed incorrectly. - Added additional testing to avoid it from cropping up again.
